root.name: SiN: Wages of Sin
root.description: New AdditionsBlade's Magnum can be dual wielded and this carries over to the regular game. New weapons Plasma Crossbow - This weapon can shoot plasma arrows that detonates after a short time after impact, it use cells like any energy weapon. Flamer - It's a flamethrower. Multiple launcher - This weapon is a backpack rocket launcher capable of firing 4 rockets simultaneously. Also it's quite devastating and eats up ammo quickly. Nuke cannon - This cannon is a new ultimate weapon in the game and it blasts enemies with a powerful explosion. New ItemNight Vision Goggles - Used for seeing in low light situations.
